Introduction

EXO-CBX (also known as CBX) is the first sub-unit of the boy group EXO, under INB100. They debuted on October 31, 2016, with their first mini-album Hey Mama!

On January 8, 2024, it was announced that CBX's unit activities, along with the unit's members' solo activities, would be managed by INB100, a label founded by Baekhyun.
